meanings.definition: Obtain by devious or dishonest means.
meanings.sent1: He finagles his way into getting extra cookies.
meanings.sent2: She always finagles a discount at the store.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox finagles the chickens out of their feed.
meanings.sent4: The con artist finagles his victims out of their money.
meanings.sent5: The sneaky raccoon finagles its way into the trash can for a late-night snack.

meanings.definition: Use devious or dishonest methods to achieve something.
meanings.sent1: The student finagles a passing grade by copying answers.
meanings.sent2: He finagles his competitors out of the race by sabotaging their bikes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat finagles its way into the closed room.
meanings.sent4: The cunning politician finagles his opponents out of the election.
meanings.sent5: The sly magician finagles the audience's attention with his tricks.

meanings.sent1: She finagles her brother into doing her chores for her.
meanings.sent2: The scammer finagles unsuspecting victims out of their money.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy finagles its way into getting extra treats.
meanings.sent4: The clever spy finagles the enemy into revealing their plans.
meanings.sent5: The smooth talker finagles his date into going out with him.
